name: swapperd-native
description: Swapperd Native Application for conducting Atomic Swaps.

scripts.start: npm run pre-build; cd ./build; NODE_ENV=development npm run start
scripts.build-mac: npm run pre-build; cd ./build; npm run build-mac
scripts.build-win: npm run pre-build; cd ./build; npm run build-win
scripts.build-linux: npm run pre-build; cd ./build; npm run build-linux
scripts.build-debian: npm run pre-build; cd ./build; npm run build-debian
scripts.pre-build: npm run clean; npm run build; cd ./build; npm install; npx electron-rebuild -w sqlite3 -p; cd ../
